title.native: アルカナ・ファミリア －La storia della Arcana Famiglia－
title.romaji: Arcana Famiglia: La storia della Arcana Famiglia

description:
The Arcana Famiglia is a powerful organization that keeps the peace on the trading island of Regalo. The most unique trait of this prestigious "family" is their mastery of the Arcana - mystical powers derived from tarot cards. The current leader of the Arcana Famiglia, Mondo, wishes to choose a successor through a tournament called the Arcana Duello, and as an added incentive, the winner will take the hand of Mondo's daughter, Felicita. However, two young men among the family - impetuous Liberta and serious-minded Nova - are more interested in protecting Felicita's freedom than letting her be someone's trophy wife. Together, Liberta, Nova, and Felicita get to know each other better ... but with Felicita's ability to read minds, she may discover more than she bargained for in Liberta's violent past and Nova's troubled family history. Can the trio remain friends, or will the growing tension between them be too much to bear?

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Male Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several male characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Mafia
tags.description: Centered around Italian organised crime syndicates.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

node.description:
__Height:__ 173 cm
__Skills & Abilities:__ Kendo

[Profile (Pony Canyon)](https://www.ponycanyon.co.jp/artist/31356600) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/black_fukuyama)

Fukuyama released his debut music album "Romantic World 31" on his birthday (November 26) in 2009, his second album "Love Letters 2: Paris Romantic" on July 21, 2010, his third album "Fukuyama Jun, Ai wo Utau!" on May 25, 2011, and his fourth album "Love Letter 3 ~Matsuri no Kuni de~" on May 22, 2013. He also appeared in a 2009 romantic comedy movie Fujoshi Kanojo in a cameo role.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Joker](https://anilist.co/character/121590/Ren-Amamiya) - Persona 5
- Renya Goutou - 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
- [Camu](https://anilist.co/character/278324/Camu) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- [Kamui](https://anilist.co/character/259960) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- Vyn Richter - Tears of Themis
- Martin - Rune Factory 5
- Hugo - Zenless Zone Zero
- Logos - Arknights

[Profile](http://www.kenproduction.co.jp/talent/member.php?mem=m47) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/numanumakapa)

Married voice actress [Yuka Nishigaki](https://anilist.co/staff/105045) in 2015. Part of the trio Trignal with fellow voice actors [Takuya Eguchi](https://anilist.co/staff/102695/Takuya-Eguchi) and [Ryohei Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/96762). Hosts radio programs for Kiramune.

A Japanese anime director, storyboard artist, and animator.

He began playing classical piano at the age of 5 and learned other instruments from his experience playing with a brass band (flute) and rock band (drums). After graduating from the Nihon University College of Arts he worked as a composer at KOEI, working on the music for a number of their games. He left the company in 2006 and has since been composing for TV, anime, and movies.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YooheySuzuki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/鈴木洋平_(アニメ演出家))

Youhei Suzuki is a director and former director of photography formerly working for [J.C.Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/JC-Staff). Currently freelance.

Not to be confused with the producer of the same name Youhei Suzuki (鈴木洋平).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YooheySuzuki) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/鈴木洋平_(アニメ演出家))

Youhei Suzuki is a director and former director of photography formerly working for [J.C.Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/JC-Staff). Currently freelance.

Not to be confused with the producer of the same name Youhei Suzuki (鈴木洋平).

Affiliated with [J.C. Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/), where he is one of the studio's leading animators. His drawing corrections as animation director are known for his advanced drawing skills. Additionally, he is occasionally entrusted with powerful character acting and action sequences.
Worked as a producer in the beginning of his career.
Worked as a producer in the beginning of his career.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TOPPY1218)

**Tomohiro Furukawa** is a director, storyboard artist, and animator best known for [**Shoujo☆Kageki Revue Starlight**](https://anilist.co/anime/98658/ShoujoKageki-Revue-Starlight/). Furukawa's directorial debut was in 2011 on the [*Kunihiko Ikuhara*](https://anilist.co/staff/100082/Kunihiko-Ikuhara)-led [**Mawaru Penguindrum**](https://anilist.co/anime/10721/Mawaru-Penguindrum/) where by the end of the project he was co-storyboarding every episode. As a director he absorbed many 'Ikuni school' aesthetic flourishes such as recurring visual motifs with different nuance and stage direction, and infused his own action animator background into his storyboards.
